sqlMap.sql: BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, CITY_NUM, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LIKES
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BOARD_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS BOARD_NUM FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, CITY_NUM, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LIKES, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE) VALUES(#board_num#, #member_num#, #city_num#, #content#, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #likes#, #file_name#, #file_path#, #file_size#, #file_type#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, B.MEMBER_NUM AS MEMBER_NUM, B.CITY_NUM AS CITY_NUM, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LIKES, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, CI.CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME, CO.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, CON.CONTINENT_NAME AS CONTINENT_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM JOIN CITY CI ON CI.CITY_NUM = B.CITY_NUM JOIN COUNTRY CO ON CI.COUNTRY_NUM = CO.COUNTRY_NUM JOIN CONTINENT CON ON CO.CONTINENT_NUM = CON.CONTINENT_NUM ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CITY_NUM=#city_num#, CONTENT=#content#, MODIFY_TIME=SYSDATE, FILE_NAME = #file_name#, FILE_PATH = #file_path#, FILE_SIZE = #file_size#, FILE_TYPE = #file_type# WHERE BOARD_NUM=#board_num#
